full_threads.body:
First Name:
Celeste
Last Name:
Mordaunt
Email Address:
mordauntceleste@gmail.com
Contact number:
0497170832
Who is completing the complaint?:
The complainant
Street address:
12a Pondee Place
City:
Toronto
State:
NSW
Postcode:
2283
Please explain your complaint in detail:
I am writing to lodge a formal complaint regarding the conduct of Maggie Pressnall, General Manager, Customers and Communities, in her handling of my tenancy and the serious issues at my property. Her actions and decisions have been marked by neglect, intimidation, a lack of transparency, and an abuse of power, all of which have significantly impacted both myself and my son.

This complaint is in relation to, but not limited to, the following ongoing failures, procedural breaches, and unethical conduct by Maggie Pressnall and WHC as an organisation:

Negligence in Addressing Severe Health and Safety Risks (Mould & Infestation Issues)

Despite my repeated complaints and requests for urgent remediation, Maggie Pressnall has failed to:

Take appropriate action to rectify the dangerous levels of mould in the property.

Provide transparency regarding any independent mould inspections and reports, which remain questionable and potentially falsified.

Acknowledge or address the ongoing pest infestation at the property, which has further exacerbated the unsanitary and unsafe conditions.

Adhere to WHC's legal obligations under the Residential Tenancies Act 2010 (NSW) to maintain the premises in a safe and habitable condition.

These failures have resulted in severe risks to my health and that of my son, yet Maggie continues to ignore or downplay these concerns.

Lack of Transparency and Questionable Reports & Works Conducted

WHC has failed to provide clear, verified documentation of the works allegedly undertaken at my property, despite repeated requests.

The "mould clearance report" that was produced appears to be fabricated or manipulated, as no proper remediation or thorough investigation was conducted. This was completely ignored and disregarded when brought to Maggies attention on several different occasions. With one being the skype meeting in which maggie "shut it down" as i was emotional yes, but asking for clarification which i never received. I have the initial dodgy mould report received... with the "mould specialist" not arriving at my property till 25 minutes after receiving the fabricated report

There is no transparency in who conducted these works, what they entailed, or the associated costs.

These actions suggest a deliberate attempt to conceal evidence and misrepresent the true state of my property.

Bullying, Intimidation, and Retaliatory Actions Against Me

Maggie's conduct has been evasive, dismissive, and emotionless most recently aggressive, heavy-handed, and designed to intimidate me into silence. This includes:

Issuing an unreasonable and unlawful breach notice over the removal of a light switch cover, falsely categorising it as "high-risk electrical work."

Attempting to pressure me into a conditional removal of my security cameras, which were installed for safety reasons.

Using threats to my tenancy as a means of control, in direct contradiction to WHC's duty to support and protect tenants.

Failing to acknowledge my legal rights as a tenant and instead using tactics of coercion and manipulation.

This behaviour is entirely unacceptable and constitutes a gross abuse of power.

The Skype Meeting - A Deliberate Attempt to Avoid Addressing Key Issues

During our Skype meeting, no substantive discussions about the mould, property safety concerns, or necessary repairs took place. Instead:

The meeting was deliberately steered away from the real issues, showing an unwillingness to address critical matters affecting my health and tenancy.

My valid concerns were ignored, dismissed, or deflected, demonstrating a complete lack of accountability.

This meeting was a wasted opportunity for resolution, further evidencing WHC's deliberate inaction and neglect.

Billing and Accounting Irregularities

WHC has failed to provide clear and accurate information regarding charges and financial transactions related to my tenancy. Issues include:

A complete lack of transparency regarding what I have been billed for.

Possible overcharging or unexplained financial discrepancies.

Charges and deductions applied to my account incorrectly or without informing Me

WHC's failure to clarify who is responsible for certain costs related to alleged works at the property.

The mishandling of my financial records further erodes trust and raises serious concerns about WHC's financial practices.

Refusal to Acknowledge My Possessions That Require Replacement or Compensation

Maggie has outright refused to:

Recognise the damage to my personal belongings in relation to initial lack of maintaince causing the mould..... and mould all over everything.....but also the work the contractors undertook left ALL my possessions completely exposed. Despite an attempt to verbally ensure my possessions were protected, this is simply untrue and a clear discrepancy is even seen within the alternating reports [provided by Maggie- apart from my own witness and documented evidence. Only a portion of my things were ever covered and that was well AFTER it had been compromised anyway

Offer any form of compensation or replacement for items that have been made unusable due to the unsafe living conditions.

This is yet another instance of WHC eluding responsibility for their negligence.

WHC's Conduct Contradicts Its Own Policies & Procedures

WHC claims to be committed to providing safe, secure, and appropriate housing for tenants. However, Maggie's handling of my case has been in direct violation of these principles, including:

Failure to follow fair and lawful procedures in investigating and addressing my tenancy concerns.

Retaliatory behaviour and intimidation tactics, contradicting WHC's duty of care.

Refusal to provide transparent communication and information, which violates ethical housing management standards.

This represents a serious breach of WHC's own mission statement and responsibilities as a community housing provider.



Demand for Immediate Action & Accountability

In light of these significant failures and abuses, I formally demand that WHC:

Conduct an independent investigation into Maggie Pressnall's handling of my tenancy and the concerns raised in this complaint.

(- there are more however im not entirely sure all the blame is directed at Maggie, however as the general manager and thus far the most senior representative of WHCs involvement in this i could only assume she had/s the most capacity to effectively address my issues in a most appropriate and timely manner. I could only hope that her attitude and behaviour isnt a trickle down systemic approach taken to Your clients - that being Women and Children. Many of Whom are vunerable, attempting to recover or are in a genuine state of requiring consideration care and support that isnt identifiably similar to those experiences and relations theyve attempted to seperate from - domestic and family violence takes many forms- that being--- silent treatments or active breakdowns in communication, cohesion, manipulation, gaslighting, bullying, intimidation and mistruths)

Withdraw the unlawful breach notice issued against me.

Provide full transparency regarding all works, inspections, and financial matters related to my tenancy.

Take immediate steps to remediate the mould and pest issues in my property.

Acknowledge and compensate me for damaged personal belongings and extra expenses ive had to incur while this matter continues to be ignored?? In an attempt to perhaps see Me give up?? My home is UNINHABITABLE and has been PRIOR to me moving in. Despite my continued and repeated please to CONSIDER my Sons HEALTH and SAFETY. Despite enlightening Maggie to information i have gathered directly from the property and further evidence of not only conflict of interest regarding the mould inspector but also by His own admittance the reliability of his reports being questionable. And supplying most recent evidences that mould IS growing back, there are STILL major health and safety issues with the property. Maggie has continued to refuse to engage or acknowledge this. Hiding behind falsified reports - i feel like im being treated as the issue opposed to recognising that there is MAJOR FLAWS with promoting the safety and empowerment of Women while disregarding them completely in real time situation.

Cease all retaliatory actions and ensure I am not subjected to further intimidation.

Failure to take appropriate action will leave me with no choice but to escalate this matter to NSW Fair Trading, the NSW Civil and Administrative Tribunal (NCAT), and other relevant regulatory bodies.

I request a formal response within 3 days as stated by your complaints policy page detailing the actions WHC will take to address this complaint.

Sincerely,

Celeste Mordaunt
